speaker: Messenger
dialog: Bless you, fair dame! I am not to you known,

speaker: Messenger
dialog: Though in your state of honour I am perfect.

speaker: Messenger
dialog: I doubt some danger does approach you nearly:

speaker: Messenger
dialog: If you will take a homely man's advice,

speaker: Messenger
dialog: Be not found here; hence, with your little ones.

speaker: Messenger
dialog: To fright you thus, methinks, I am too savage;

speaker: Messenger
dialog: To do worse to you were fell cruelty,

speaker: Messenger
dialog: Which is too nigh your person. Heaven preserve you!

speaker: Messenger
dialog: I dare abide no longer.

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: Whither should I fly?

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: I have done no harm. But I remember now

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: I am in this earthly world; where to do harm

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: Accounted dangerous folly: why then, alas,

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: Do I put up that womanly defence,

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: To say I have done no harm?

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: What are these faces?

speaker: First Murderer
dialog: Where is your husband?

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: I hope, in no place so unsanctified

speaker: Lady MacDuff
dialog: Where such as thou mayst find him.

speaker: First Murderer
dialog: He's a traitor.

speaker: Son
dialog: Thou liest, thou shag-hair'd villain!

speaker: First Murderer
dialog: What, you egg!

speaker: First Murderer
dialog: Young fry of treachery!

speaker: Son
dialog: He has kill'd me, mother:

speaker: Son
dialog: Run away, I pray you!
